Defines

Bits per pixel
Define the number of bits per pixel used in your graphics buffer.

#define ONE_BIT   0
#define EIGHT_BITS   8
Size of pixel
define the size of the video buffer used in your graphics buffer.

#define BYTES   1
#define BITS   1/8

Detailed Description

Manipulate the graphic buffer.

You can draw line,point, or bitmap with the graphic buffer functions. After drawing in the graphic buffer, you can draw it in LCD Screen

Note:
For bitmap function, parameters are built by POB-TOOLS : POB Bitmap. this tools produce a '.h' that contains bitmap array and bitmap ID.
See also:
lcd.h
Author:
Pierre SEGUIN. POB-Technology

Define Documentation

#define BITS   1/8

#define BYTES   1

#define EIGHT_BITS   8

The graphic buffer use 8 bits per pixel

#define ONE_BIT   0

The graphic buffer use 1 bit per pixel

void ClearGraphicBuffer ( const GraphicBuffer *  Target  ) 

Clear a graphic buffer.

Parameters:
Target : pointer on the buffer to be cleared.

void DrawBitmap ( UInt8  x,
UInt8  y,
UInt8  id,
const UInt8 *  bitmap,
const GraphicBuffer *  target 
)

Draw a Bitmap in a graphic buffer.

Parameters:
x,y : Where the bitmap will be drawn in the graphic buffer.
id : Id of the Bitmap in the Bitmap list.
bitmap : the bitmap list. (this bitmap list is build by POB Bitmap)
target : Pointer on a GraphicBuffer, on which the bitmap will be drawn.

UInt8 DrawComponentInABufferVideo ( UInt8 *  Componant,
const GraphicBuffer *  LCD_Buff 
)

Draw component in a buffer video.

Parameters:
Componant : pointer on a component.
LCD_Buff : Pointer on a graphic buffer, has to 64*64 pixels and each pixel has EIGHT_BITS per pixel

UInt16  Y1,
UInt16  X2,

Draw a line on a graphic Buffer.

Parameters:
X1,Y1 : Where the first point is.
X2,Y2 : Where the second point is.
Target : Pointer on a GraphicBuffer where the line wil be drawn.

const UInt8 *  Bitmap

Get the height of a Bitmap.

Parameter's are set by POB Tools : POB Bitmap.

Parameters:
id : Id of the Bitmap in the bitmap list.
Bitmap : the bitmap list. (this bitmap list is build by POB Bitmap)
Returns:
the height of bitmap.

Parameter's are set by POB Tools : POB Bitmap.

Parameters:
id : ID of the Bitmap in the bitmap list.
Bitmap : the bitmap list. (this bitmap list is build by POB Bitmap)
Returns:
The width of bitmap.

void InitGraphicBuffer ( GraphicBuffer *  Target,
UInt8  w,
UInt8  h,
UInt8  bits,
UInt8 *  Buffer 
)

Init a graphic buffer.

Parameters:
Target : graphic buffer to init
w : Width of buffer.
h : Heigth of buffer.
bits : Number of bits per pixel : ONE_BIT or EIGHT_BITS
Buffer : Video buffer (used for display). You must create an array of a size : width * heigth * size of pixel (BYTES or BITS)

Parameters:
X,Y : Where the point will be drawn
Target : Pointer on a GraphicBuffer where the point will be drawn
